ComicInfo.Title: "So this is my life now?" [Tech Jacket Chapter 3 of 8]
ComicInfo.Summary: THE VILTRUMITE WAR CONTINUES!Invincible is stranded on an alien planet, clinging to life, left battered and broken from his battle with Conquest. Nolan and Oliver stay behind to nurse him back to health, but meanwhile, out in space, the war rages on.
